page.title: 18A DAY WITH A HOUSEWIFE
page.content: Although I rise at 7.30pm my brain isn't awake till near 10.00am so preparing breakfast,packed lunches and seeing my husband and two sons of to work and school is done on automatic pilot.I spend the mornings doing sewing,housework except Tuesdays when the children in Junior 1 and 2 class read stories to me.After a snack lunch about 1pm I cook or garden or decorate,all things I enjoy,till the boys come home from school at about 4.00pm.From then till 6 ish when we eat our main meal of the day.I hear the boys news make a drink and a snack for them and prepare our meal.Evenings are spent reading,gardening,and watching Tele.At about 10.30 I lay the breakfast table ,I have to.I'm on automatic pilot in the morning and so to bed.
